import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-crear-cliente', templateUrl: './crear-cliente.component.html', styleUrls: ['./crear-cliente.component.css'] }) export class CrearClienteComponent { tiles: any[] = [ {text: 'One', cols: 3, rows: 1, color: 'lightblue'}, {text: 'Two', cols: 1, rows: 2, color: 'lightgreen'}, {text: 'Three', cols: 1, rows: 1, color: 'lightpink'}, {text: 'Four', cols: 2, rows: 1, color: '#DDBDF1'}, ]; }
Crear Cliente
Nombre IMG Apellido Sexo Edad Telefono Localidad Boton
